title: All the Backlist! January 11, 2019
description:
This week, Liberty discusses a few great older books, including The Earthquake Bird.
This episode is sponsored by the Read Harder journal from Book Riot and Avon Kiss Con Weekend Affair.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
Mouthful of Birds: Stories by Samanta Schweblin
The Earthquake Bird by Susanna Jones
The Good Lord Bird by James McBride
When Women Were Birds: Fifty-Four Variations on Voice by Terry Tempest Williams
The Thorn Birds by Colleen McCullough
Little Women by Louisa May Alcott
The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle by Haruki Murakami
The Birds and Other Stories by Daphne duMaurier
A Pigeon and a Boy by Meir Shalev
The Book of Boy by Catherine Gilbert Murdock
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
